text:
@SteveScalise @USRepLong https://t.co/T6kXgDfQJ6

GOP Wishlist: Limited liability for employers when it comes to employee COVID-19 lawsuits for not providing safe work environment

They leave us to die for their economy

You will do what I say when I say
Back to the front

#GOPDeathCult #DisposableHeroes
